body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Christopher Baker and I'm from Security Solutions Inc. May I get your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diane. Can you please provide me with the spelling of your last name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Diane. Now, for security purposes, could you provide me with the first four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's eight three one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Now, may I ask for the month you were born in, spelled out?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Diane. I appreciate your cooperation. Is there anything else you'd like to address before we conclude our conversation?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I think we covered everything. Thank you for your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Diane. Thank you for your time and have a great day!
